title: Constructively Aligned Mathematics Pedagogy Through Learning Data Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (secondary level)
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment emphasizing smartphone-based instruction for novice learners entering healthcare/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can interpret mathematics learning data designed according to the construct alignment principle with 85% accuracy.
Learners can analyze and provide feedback on their learning progress data using the Open Learner Model (OLM) interface at least three times.
Learners can implement an ontology-based data collection system with a 70% application rate when designing learning activities linked to assessment objectives.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
